bean.p:messageText: @{document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.alternateCOCodesUIList} is a crosslisted alias for: @{document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.courseOfferingCode}(Owner). Changes made on this page to @{document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.courseOfferingCode}(Owner) will be applied to all aliases, including @{document.newMaintainableObject.dataObject.alternateCOCodesUIList}.
Deleting a delivery format will delete all of its activities and registration groups from the system.
